DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective comparative case series comprise 70 patient treat polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy intravitreal ranibizumab injection 112 control subject . Patients genotyped LOC387715 ( rs10490924 ) , HTRA1 gene ( rs11200638 ) , VEGF ( rs3025039 rs833069 ) polymorphism use Real-Time polymerase chain reaction .
